name: Arrow 25FT Tape Measure, Easy Read Measuring Tape with Dual Locking System, Double Sided Measurement Tape with 1.25″ Blade, Belt Clip, Dual-End Metal Hook, and Rubber Protective Casing
short_description: QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Crafted from thickened carbon steel with a durable nylon coating, this tape measure delivers long-lasting performance. Its 1.25″-wide blade extends up to 11 ft without bending—stiff, smooth, and ready for precise measurements.

DUAL LOCKING SYSTEM: Unlike tape measures with only a single lock, ours combines a secure sliding thumb lock for rock-steady hold with an integrated finger brake for controlled rewind. Switch seamlessly between firm blade lock and smooth retraction to suit any task.

PRECISE MEASUREMENT SYSTEM: Featuring a 1.25″-wide, double-sided blade with clear foot marks, 16″ stud marks, and triangle indicators every 19.2″, this 25 ft tape ensures fast, accurate readings—ideal for engineers, builders, carpenters, and DIY enthusiasts.

PORTABLE & VERSATILE DESIGN: Built-in metal belt clip and dual-end hook let you attach the tape measure to your belt, bag, or workbench for hands-free convenience. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor projects.

DROP-RESISTANT AND ERGONOMIC: Rubber-overmolded casing and an ergonomic grip absorb shocks and withstand drops, protecting both the tape and your hand during long hours on the job. It makes a practical, high-quality gift for friends and family.
